creativity.aboutText1: — is not just a workshop, it's a space where everyone can touch the ancient art of ceramics and create something unique with their own hands.
creativity.aboutText2: We started with a small studio and a dream — to give people the opportunity to disconnect from everyday life and immerse themselves in the meditative process of working with clay.
creativity.aboutText3: Today we are one of the leading pottery workshops in Bishkek, where more than 1000 people have been trained.
creativity.creativeSpaceText: Creating a space for creativity and inspiration
creativity.historyDescription: From one pottery wheel to a creative house — learn how we grew and developed together with our students.

faqCreativity.q1: Do I need experience to participate in a masterclass?
faqCreativity.a1: No, our masterclasses are suitable for complete beginners. The master will explain everything from scratch and help at every step.
faqCreativity.q2: What's included in the masterclass price?
faqCreativity.a2: The price includes all materials, master's work, firing and packaging. You pick up your finished piece 3-4 weeks after firing.
faqCreativity.q3: Can I come with my own ideas?
faqCreativity.a3: Of course! We welcome creative approach. Discuss your idea with the master before the class.
faqCreativity.q4: How do I sign up for a masterclass?
faqCreativity.q5: Is the masterclass suitable for children?
faqCreativity.a5: Yes! We conduct masterclasses for children from 3 years old. For the youngest, we recommend slab pottery.

faqHotel.q1: What time is check-in and check-out?
faqHotel.a1: Standard check-in is from 14:00, check-out is until 12:00. Early check-in or late check-out is possible by prior arrangement.
faqHotel.q2: How do I pay for accommodation?
faqHotel.a2: We accept cash, bank cards and transfers. 50% prepayment upon booking, the rest upon check-in.
faqHotel.a3: Free cancellation 24 hours before check-in. For later cancellation, the prepayment is non-refundable.
faqHotel.a4: Yes, free secure parking for hotel guests.
faqHotel.a5: Unfortunately, accommodation with pets is not provided.
